select i.*,p.name projectName, c.co_name companyName, rt.revenue_type_name, u.username from invoice i left join `user` u on u.user_id = i.operator left join project p using (project_id) left join company c using (company_id) left join revenue_type rt using (revenue_type_id) where 1=1
and u.username like "%${username}%"
and (i.invoice_no like "%${keyWord}%" or i.unitname like "%${keyWord}%")
AND i.create_datetime > #{startDate} AND i.create_datetime < #{endDate}
order by i.invoice_id desc
